Linux shared and managed hosting plans below are suitable for start-ups, professional or established websites including blogs, CMS and other web applications. Dedicated IPs available on request.

COMPARE PLANS AND FEATURES | Order Now

• Latest Management Platform Cpanel
• IMAP and POP3 (SSL) Email accounts
• Webmail and FTP Accounts (Roundcube and SquirrelMail Included)
• Firewall and Malware Scanner
• Available Addon or Parked Domains and Subdomains
• Apache 2, Perl, Ruby on Rails, PHP 5 with suphp + Mysql Databases
• ASP.net, Frontpage Extensions, ColdFusion and ODBC Support
• CloudFlare Enabled
• Pagespeed Enabled
• Gigabit Network Speed
• 99% Uptime Guarantee
• Instant Setup
• Daily Remote Backups
• 24/7 Support via email, phone or Live help
• FREE data migration from your old host (Joomla and Wordpress only)

**MGJEO - TEST&KEEP**
Disk Space : 250 MB

Price : $0.99 /month

**MGBRONZE - STARTER**
